General.Name: Cubic Digital Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Cubic Digital Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel frame foamed cement composite boards in China. Its products include shaped plates, grid plates, light boards, slabs, industry wall boards, slabs, and composite core roof panel. Cubic Digital Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Liangbao  Xiang
1.Title: Exec. Deputy GM, Board Sec. & CFO
